name: places/ChIJ86AWJf5YwokRBvuRhJjLSRA
formattedAddress: 139 Centre St STE 616, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 139 Centre St STE 616, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
In just 2 weeks, Hannah transformed my skin! Yes, the extractions can be a bit painful, but trust me, the results are totally worth it. She skillfully clears out your pores, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and renewed. The pain is temporary, but the glow is forever!

Hannah doesn't just stop at treatment; she recommends an affordable skincare routine tailored to your skin type. No weird chemicals—just a thorough cleanse and a proper assessment that leaves your skin glowing.

What sets Hannah apart is not just her expertise but also her kindness. She's always ready to answer questions and address concerns. She's become my go-to, and I can't wait to go back. If you want fantastic skin and a great experience, Hannah is your person!

originalText.text: Hannah is a miracle worker and I cannot recommend her enough. She is extremely knowledgeable—beyond the in-office treatment, she also crafted a brand new skincare routine for me. As someone who has had clear skin for most of my life, it’s been a brutal few months having to deal with extreme breakouts. Hannah explained my skin type, the reason behind my breakouts, extracted EVERYTHING, and gave me specific instructions as to how I can completely clear up my skin. She’s both honest and kind. I’m so grateful to have come across Hannah and Acne Institute, and am feeling hopeful for the first time in a while about my skincare journey.

originalText.text: Today was my first ever appointment with Hannah. I initially came in for an extraction facial however, Hannah recommended I also do microdermabrasion. I've been looking for a facial spot where quality matters most, and I believe I have found it! Hannah takes her time with you from beginning to end, she is so caring and knowledgeable and not to mention sweet. She taught me so much in one visit that I wish I had known of her sooner. She caters to your specific skin type. She went above and beyond and even recommended products that I would say are very much affordable and wouldn't have tried on my own due to following the "hype" and what's currently "trending". Oh, and let's not forget that she gave me the BEST extraction I have ever received, she went all the way into my hairline! I've struggled so much with acne around that area and no place I went to helped with that. I know my skin will only get better from now on and that's all thanks to Hannah. I will definitely be coming back to her, she is my new facial go to! The place itself is also in a great location, near most trains and very easy to find. It has a cozy feel to it and I loved the music choice she was playing during the facial. 10/10 experience.

originalText.text: I went to Hannah for the first time and she was absolutely amazing. She was extremely knowledgeable and provided such clear direction on the troubles my skin was facing as well as how I can resolve it proactively. She takes a less is more approach unlike other places. She gave me a routine post facial and really explained each and every process before doing anything on my face. I will be going back to her seasonally!

originalText.text: I have struggled with sensitive skin, rosacea, and acne for my entire life. Have done most treatments known to man, including multiple prescriptions from dermatologists, but no one has examined my skin more thoroughly and helped me make progress on my skin goals than Hannah from Acne Institute. After reading all of her reviews, I gave her my full trust and followed her recommendations and new routine after my deep cleansing facial. After a month, I’ve never seen my skin in a better state in my 28 years. I keep telling my family how I trust this woman more than anyone in my life LOL. Go to Hannah, she will help you understand what you can and can’t use - little did I know that all I needed to do to fix my skin issues was to find someone who truly takes the time to know what’s right for you. And let me tell you - a derm won’t take the time to do that.
